          <title>
            <string language="en">Structure of the binding pocket on chyromotrypsin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Struktur der verbindlichen Tasche auf 
chyromotrypsin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Structure de la poche obligatoire sur le 
chyromotrypsin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estrutura do bolso obrigatório no 
chyromotrypsin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Struttura della tasca obbligatoria sul 
chyromotrypsin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δομή της δεσμευτικής τσέπης στο chyromotrypsin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estructura del bolsillo obligatorio en 
chyromotrypsin</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the structure of the region on chyromotrypsin where the tyrosine residue binds the polypeptide.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">binding pocket</string>
          </keyword>

            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Struktur der Region auf
chyromotrypsin, in dem der Tyrosinüberrest das Polypeptid bindet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la structure de la 
région sur le chyromotrypsin où le résidu de tyrosine lie le 
polypeptide.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a estrutura da região 
no chyromotrypsin onde o resíduo do tyrosine liga o polypeptide.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la struttura della 
regione sul chyromotrypsin dove il residuo della tirosina lega il 
polipeptide.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη δομή της περιοχής στο 
chyromotrypsin όπου το tyrosine υπόλειμμα δεσμεύει 
polypeptide.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la estructura de la 
región en el chyromotrypsin donde el residuo del tyrosine ata el 
polipéptido.</string>
          </description>
